timeline.bodyText: There is a risk that Class.getClassLoader() will be null if the class was loaded by bootstrap class loader. Are we sure that this never happens? I understand that this code snippet was already involved in the code base - this PR does not add it. But just wondering.
timeline.author: ochaloup

replies.bodyText: @ochaloup not sure TBH. Maybe worth exploring in the new JBTM?
replies.author: xstefank

replies.bodyText: +1, I will create a jira for it
replies.author: ochaloup

replies.bodyText:
The bootstrap class loader loads system classes but the CDI extension is not a system class so a null check is not necessary.
Even if this were not the case, then why create a JIRA rather than updating the PR by checking for null, the code already handles null values on the next line (but this is really not necessary).
replies.author: mmusgrov
